message: Let's split it evenly to get a fair deal!
You're leaving me with peanuts! I want a bigger share!
Meet me halfway, Bob! I'm willing to give you a better deal.
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'm willing to compromise, but not that much!
I'm getting impatient, Bob. This is my best offer so far!
I'm not going to let you walk all over me! I'm taking a bigger share this time!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice! I'm not going to let you take everything!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going to get any better than this!
You're really trying to bankrupt me, Alice! I'm taking the rest, I don't care!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both end up with nothing.
